name: part_009
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】紫咲シオン 4th Anniversary LIVE【#紫咲シオン4周年記念】 [WkUXJUQMZ-8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: Applause and transition after the song.
Shion thanks the audience and begins introducing her backing band.
Shion introduces the keyboardist, a black cat character.
Shion introduces the drummer, another black cat character.
Shion introduces the bassist and comments on their cute appearance.
Shion talks about the effort she put into the song and dance, then announces new merchandise.
Announcement screen for Shion's 4th Anniversary merchandise.

subtitles.original: ...もっと チャンスを
subtitles.english: ...more, chances!

subtitles.original: チャンスを もっと チャンスを
subtitles.english: Chances, even more chances!

subtitles.original: 想いを もっと 伝えよう
subtitles.english: Let's convey our feelings more!

subtitles.original: ワンワン 想いを もっと 伝えよう
subtitles.english: Bow-wow, let's convey our feelings more!

subtitles.original: 気持ちから イェーイ！アンコール！ もっかい！
subtitles.english: From the heart, yay! Encore! One more time!

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, so

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no music no life, oh my no-no when all right

subtitles.original: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, I love!
subtitles.english: Oh my no-no soft way, baby have a favorite, I love!

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで、GO! GO! MANIACでしたー！いえーい！
subtitles.english: Alright! So, that was 'GO! GO! MANIAC'! Yay!

subtitles.original: ねぇ、みなさん、ずっと気になってた...「え、後ろになんか化け物いるじゃん」って思ってたでしょ？
subtitles.english:
Hey, everyone, you've been wondering...
"Hey, there's some kind of monster behind her," right?

subtitles.original: 一人ずつ見ちゃおう。
subtitles.english: Let's take a look at them one by one.

subtitles.original: こいつね。こいつ頑張ってね。絶対それ弾けないじゃんみたいな手の短さで頑張ってね。どうやって弾いてたんでしょうか。
subtitles.english:
This one here. He's doing his best.
Doing his best with such short arms that look like they couldn't possibly play.
I wonder how he was playing.

subtitles.original: どうやって弾いてたんでしょうか彼は。頑張って弾いてくれてます。
subtitles.english: I wonder how he was playing. He's trying his hardest for us.

subtitles.original: かわいいね、かわいいね、踏みたい。踏みたい可愛さしてるね。いいね。
subtitles.english:
So cute, so cute, I want to step on him.
He's got that "step-on-me" kind of cuteness. Nice.

subtitles.original: こいつね。ねぇ、君どうやって叩いてたの？叩けるの、それ？
subtitles.english:
This one. Hey, how were you drumming?
Can you even hit those?

subtitles.original: あ、叩けるね！かわいいね！ふふ、肉球みたいな、肉球あるじゃん。かわいい。
subtitles.english:
Oh, he can hit them! So cute!
Hehe, like little paw pads, he's got paw pads. Cute.

subtitles.original: ねぇ、みんな、これさ、なんか頑張ってるときさ、こうやってクイクイしながら頑張ってたじゃん。
subtitles.english:
Hey, everyone, while he was working hard,
he was doing this wiggling thing, right?

subtitles.original: この顔がいいよね、頑張ってますみたいな。ね、頑張ってますね。
subtitles.english:
This face is great, like "I'm doing my best."
Yeah, he's really trying hard.

subtitles.original: かわいいー。
subtitles.english: So cute.

subtitles.original: 次ね。これ、えーと、何て言うんだっけ...ドラムだ、ドラム！思い出した、ドラムだ。かわいい。
subtitles.english:
Next. This, uh, what do you call it...
It's the drums, the drums! I remembered, it's the drums. Cute.

subtitles.original: こいつね、こいつベース。こいつもね、あのキーボードの人と一緒で、どうやって弾いてんねん、みたいな。
subtitles.english:
And this one's the bass.
Just like the keyboardist, it's like, "How are you playing that?"

subtitles.original: こんな、こんなちっちゃな手でどうやって弾いてんのこれ。
subtitles.english: How are you playing with such tiny hands?

subtitles.original: どうやって弾いてんの。ねぇ。弾けるの？
subtitles.english: How are you playing it? Hey. Can you really play?

subtitles.original: 絶対届かないじゃん。あー、頑張って、あー頑張ってたのそうやって。あーそうやって頑張ってたの。絶対弾けてませんと。
subtitles.english:
There's no way you can reach. Oh, you're trying...
Oh, so that's how you were trying. He definitely can't play it.

subtitles.original: めっちゃかわいいね。こうやって頑張ってたんだよ。
subtitles.english: He's so cute. He was trying his best like that.

subtitles.original: いやー、GO! GO! MANIACね、あのー、本当にめちゃめちゃ頑張って覚えたんだけど、歌、歌を。
subtitles.english:
Wow, 'GO! GO! MANIAC'...
I really worked incredibly hard to memorize the song.

subtitles.original: そもそも歌をめっちゃ頑張って覚えたの。どこが一番大変だったかって言うと、あの最後のドラムのパート...
subtitles.english:
I worked really hard on the vocals in the first place.
As for what was the hardest part... that drum part at the end...

subtitles.original: ドラムじゃねーわ、何だ、ドラムじゃない、あの、何だっけ、英語の...
subtitles.english: It wasn't the drums, what was it... not the drums, it was... the English part!

subtitles.original: トゥルンテッテッテッテッみたいなところ、めちゃめちゃ頑張って覚えた、どうやって覚えたかって言うと、カタカナで歌詞に書いて、
subtitles.english:
The part that goes like 'turun-te-te-te-te'. I worked so hard on it.
I memorized it by writing out the lyrics in Katakana.

subtitles.original: ね、聞こえる、こうやって聞こえるなーっていうのを歌詞に書いて、頑張って覚えたんだよ。めちゃ大変だったんだからね。
subtitles.english:
I'd write down how it sounded to me and worked hard to memorize it.
It was really tough, you know!

subtitles.original: あとダンスもね！見た？みんな。ダンスも頑張ってた。ダンスも覚えるの大変だったんだからね。
subtitles.english:
And the dance too! Did you see it, everyone?
I worked hard on the dance too. Memorizing it was really difficult.

subtitles.original: あのね、振り付けを考えてもらったんだけど、Cメロのね、あのこう足を、こう足をさ、こうやってチョコンって、こうやってやったところがね、
subtitles.english:
I had the choreography made for me,
and in the bridge, when I went like this with my feet...

subtitles.original: 可愛かったね、可愛い振り付けだった。
subtitles.english: It was so cute, the choreography was adorable.

subtitles.original: いやー、可愛くて、ちょっとみんな、惚れちゃ...惚れられたら困っちゃう。
subtitles.english: It was so cute, I'm worried you all might... fall in love with me.

subtitles.original: ね、というわけで、GO! GO! MANIACでした。可愛い曲だよね。シオもね、ちょっと前にけいおんを見始めて、まだね、あの全部見れてないね、ちょっと長くて。
subtitles.english:
Anyway, that was 'GO! GO! MANIAC'. It's a cute song, right?
I started watching 'K-ON!' a while ago, but I haven't finished it yet because it's long.

subtitles.original: 長くて、ちょっと最近ちょっとね、まだ見れてないんだけど、めちゃいいな、けいおんね。そう、けいおんさんの曲でした。
subtitles.english:
It's long, so I haven't been able to watch it lately,
but 'K-ON!' is really good. So yeah, that was a 'K-ON!' song.

subtitles.original: というわけで、この後はね、あのー、実は...みんな衝撃の事実かもしんないんだけど...
subtitles.english: So, after this... actually, this might be shocking to everyone...

subtitles.original: なんと！グッズが出るんですね！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, we're releasing new merchandise!

subtitles.original: というわけで、宣伝担当の紫咲シオンさん、お願いしまーす！
subtitles.english:
And now, I'll turn it over to the PR representative,
Murasaki Shion!

subtitles.original: 紫咲シオン 活動4周年記念 8月17日 販売開始
subtitles.english: Murasaki Shion 4th Anniversary Celebration - Sales begin August 17th

subtitles.original: はーい！宣伝担当の紫咲シオンです！
subtitles.english: Hello! I'm the PR rep, Murasaki Shion!

subtitles.original: 今日はみんなに嬉しい、嬉しい、グッズのお知らせです！
subtitles.english: Today, I have some very happy news about merchandise for everyone!
